org.dsa.iot.dslink.util

Class PropertyReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.util.PropertyReference

  • public class PropertyReference
extends java.lang.Object
    Global string references for the system properties in use.
    See Also:
    System.getProperty(String)

    • Field Detail

      • NAMESPACE

        public static final java.lang.String NAMESPACE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISPATCH_DELAY

        public static final java.lang.String DISPATCH_DELAY
        An integer property that determines the dispatch delay when a client is unable to write to the network. During this delay, messages will be merged until they can be sent over the network. Default value is 75.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VALIDATE

        public static final java.lang.String VALIDATE
        A boolean property that determines the sdk should perform any validations. Currently only the dslink.json is validated. Default value is true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VALIDATE_JSON

        public static final java.lang.String VALIDATE_JSON
        A boolean property that determines whether to validate the dslink.json configuration fields. Default value is true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VALIDATE_HANDLER

        public static final java.lang.String VALIDATE_HANDLER
        A boolean property that determines whether to validate the handler class or not. The field must still exist at a minimum. Default value is true.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PropertyReference

        public PropertyReference()
